    • Method Detail

      • adapt

        public static Table adapt​(Table table,
                          Table schema,
                          Tables.ColumnHandling columnRequirement,
                          Tables.DictionaryHandling dictionaryHandling)
        Adapts the table to the schema. The ordering and selection of the new columns is defined by the Tables.ColumnHandling and the dictionary adjustments for associated categorical column by the Tables.DictionaryHandling parameter.
        Parameters:
        table - the table to adapt
        schema - the schema to adapt to
        columnRequirement - the desired handling for column ordering and selection
        dictionaryHandling - the desired handling for dictionaries of associated categorical columns
        Returns:
        the table adjusted to the schema
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the input parameters is null

      • findIncompatible

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Tables.Incompatibility> findIncompatible​(Table table,
                                                                                            Table schema,
                                                                                            Tables.ColumnSetRequirement columnRequirement,
                                                                                            Tables.TypeRequirement... typeRequirements)
        Finds the columns in the table that are incompatible with the schema according to the further parameters.
        Parameters:
        table - the table to check
        schema - the schema to check against
        columnRequirement - requirements for the column set
        typeRequirements - requirements for the types, can be empty for no type check
        Returns:
        a map from incompatible column name to reason for incompatibility
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the input parameters is null
